resources.string: "1. Set up an alarm to wake you up in 4 hours. 2. Put this device within the reach so you can grab it from your bed without waking yourself up too much. 3. Go to sleep as you normally would. 4. After you've been woken up, press the "INDUCE!" button. 5. Lay in a comfortable position, with the device screen under your finger(s). 6. Try to fall asleep while raising your fingers every so often. 7. When you fall asleep, after a set amount of time, we will notify you that you have fallen asleep by playing a sound. 8. Once you hear the sound, do a reality check. Even if you feel you are not in a dream. 9. The reality check will eventually not work. 10. ??? 11. PROFIT!"

FILD Reminder is a utility, that will help you become lucid in a dream.
